name: Dex
headline: Dex is a personal CRM that reminds you to keep in touch with the√¢¬Ä¬¶
description:
Dex is a personal CRM that reminds you to keep in touch with the people you would otherwise forget.

Dex helps turn your acquaintances into your allies.  Going beyond the superficiality of social networks requires commitment.  If you remember to keep in touch thoughtfully, you can turn the interesting person you met at a networking event into a friend that has your back.  

I built Dex after failing to keep up with the tools I tried (Airtable, Notion, etc) for relationship management. Installing an actual CRM like Hubspot felt like a wrong fit for my informal relationships -- these people were 'my team,' not customers.

Dex is a lightweight personal CRM that√¢¬Ä¬ôs easy to stick with. Key to Dex is a Chrome extension that enables you to manage relationships while you√¢¬Ä¬ôre in Facebook, Messenger, Twitter, and the social apps you already use. Dex can also send you actionable reminders (daily, or based on your calendar events) to log your interactions for next time. By using Dex, you can:

- Build stronger relationships, by sending you a nudge to follow-up.
- Be more thoughtful, by helping you remember where you left off.
- Become a superconnector, by making connections you wouldn√¢¬Ä¬ôt otherwise remember.

#  One place for your relationships ‚Äî impress with thoughtfulness 
Dex brings together LinkedIn, email, and all your daily tools. Keep in touch, remember where you left off, and see everyone you know. 
[Get Started for Free](https://getdex.com/<https:/getdex.com/appv3/preboard>)Watch video ¬∑ 1m
30,000+ people use Dex to improve relationships
[Download the Browser Extension](https://getdex.com/<https:/chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/dex-personal-crm-and-ai-a/amlpnkfionniifnajgcalfndolieichk>)
![Dex](https://getdex.com/_astro/herov4.CYqAANyr_Z1NWR5i.webp)
####  Top professionals build their network with Dex 
  * ![Google](https://getdex.com/_astro/google.DZlXZ1Ie_ZqaY9V.svg)
  * ![McKinsey](https://getdex.com/_astro/mck.CyyYxNd7_Z2kqugy.svg)
  * ![On Deck](https://getdex.com/_astro/ondeck.DsLvCP8O_TmIMy.svg)
  * ![YCombinator](https://getdex.com/_astro/yc.B8jQUx9V_Z2mkjas.svg)


  * ![The University of Chicago Booth School of Business](https://getdex.com/_astro/chicago.DJUUm_dr_Zx2C3M.webp)
  * ![Stanford Graduate School of Business](https://getdex.com/_astro/gsb.wCDWeIjQ_Z22t4GX.webp)
  * ![Harvard Business School](https://getdex.com/_astro/hbs.RA5GQmHP_Z1bf25w.webp)
  * ![Kellogg School of Management](https://getdex.com/_astro/kellogg.CXTm14Rr_1DS3wT.webp)

##  The easiest way to consolidate your relationships 
Manually keeping track of who you've met takes time you don't have. You're wasting time copying and pasting. It's even harder to keep your contacts up-to-date. 
Dex lets you connect to LinkedIn and other sources in minutes. New job titles will be synced automatically. 
Spend less time on data entry and focus on what matters ‚Äî building relationships. 
[ Get started for free ](https://getdex.com/<https:/getdex.com/appv3/preboard>)
![Image of CRM people-friendly software](https://getdex.com/_astro/Built_for_people.BEYylRKq_2l2arP.webp)
##  Built for people, not sales pipeline 
Dealing with heavy, complicated systems like Salesforce is overkill for keeping in touch. Your relationships don't belong in a sales CRM. 
Spend less time navigating menus and seamlessly pick up where you left off. 
[ Build stronger relationships ](https://getdex.com/<https:/getdex.com/appv3/preboard>)
Dex replaces complicated & manual tools 
![Airtable](https://getdex.com/_astro/Airtable.BHNn_17R_Z1DNBTk.webp) ![Excel](https://getdex.com/_astro/Excel.Dz3sNlKa_Zcn09H.webp) ![Google Sheets](https://getdex.com/_astro/Google_sheets.awdtMV1K_16Bmhm.webp) ![Hubspot](https://getdex.com/_astro/Hubspot.B-MJesA2_ZbLa1f.webp) ![Pipedrive](https://getdex.com/_astro/Pipedrive.BR8dYtJj_ZvWo7z.webp) ![Notion](https://getdex.com/_astro/Notion.B1G_Wa-R_Z2hrqAD.webp) ![iCloud Contacts](https://getdex.com/_astro/iCloud_contacts.BbDJNf90_hcAdr.webp) ![Google Contacts](https://getdex.com/_astro/Google_contact.ewEMh3XT_Z28EdWY.webp)
![Sync LinkedIn with Dex](https://getdex.com/_astro/LinkedIn.CI8KtKsO_rqHdn.webp)
##  Get more out of LinkedIn 
Sync your LinkedIn network and we'll automatically keep your contacts up-to-date. 
Dex will let you know when your connections change their title, providing the perfect opportunity to reach out. 
[ Keep up with your network ](https://getdex.com/<https:/getdex.com/appv3/preboard>)
![Remember where you left off with Dex](https://getdex.com/_astro/remember.D-sTkXjE_PIo0.webp)
##  Remember what's important 
Remember everything about everyone. Use Dex to store he important details you don't want to forget: 
  * How you met 
  * Education history 
  * Work 
  * Important dates 
  * Family 
  * Gift Ideas 
  * Event history 
  * Anything else! 


[ Build stronger relationships ](https://getdex.com/<https:/getdex.com/appv3/preboard>)
##  Manage your relationships anywhere, anytime 
At the end of a busy day, the last thing you need is another spreadsheet. 
![Browser Extension](https://getdex.com/_astro/Extension_manage%20anywhere.1nrKjHnp_ZnzzDM.webp)
###### Browser Extension
Integrate with LinkedIn, Facebook, Gmail to manage relationships in your existing workflow. 
[Install Browser Extension](https://getdex.com/</browser-extension>)
![Mobile App](https://getdex.com/_astro/mobile_app.D-0pN7pq_1baUSX.webp)
###### Mobile App
Take Dex on the go and maintain relationships from anywhere 
[Install Mobile App](https://getdex.com/</mobile>)
![Security and Privacy at Dex](https://getdex.com/_astro/Security.DvO7-0Yy_1zOeYd.webp)
##  Built to be private 
Your privacy is our top priority. Dex is supported by subscriptions, not ads. We'll never sell your data to third parties. 
With Dex, you're in full control of your data. Export or delete your data at any time. 
[ Read more about Security at Dex ](https://getdex.com/</security>)
### Loved by thousands of professionals
I've been looking for something like Dex for a long long time and I'm so glad I found it. In a busy world, it makes me the friend that I want to be for the people I care about. 
![Satoe Sakuma](https://getdex.com/_astro/satoe.BmbbsyqP_ZqEdGj.webp)
Satoe Sakuma
Software Engineer 
Dex has allowed me to be more intentional with both my personal and professional relationships. [...] This has led to some of my most serendipitous opportunities and has allowed me to make connections between folks in my network that I have not seen. 
![Joseph Sunga](https://getdex.com/_astro/joseph.B6l74RTc_Z2as9yX.webp)
Joseph Sunga
Product Leader & Investor 
Dex is the first personal CRM that provides an elegant experience for managing personal relationships, while also being powerful enough to enrich professional connections. 
![Janet Lee](https://getdex.com/_astro/janet.c7rMIbw6_Z1KjVqb.webp)
Janet Lee
MBA Candidate at UCLA Anderson 
Dex is the personal/professional CRM solution I've wanted to exist for years, but hasn't until now. I was a Contactually user in the past and have tried spreadsheets, Airtable, Pipedrive and so on - and nothing is close to Dex's focus when it comes to personal CRM. 
![Ari Newman](https://getdex.com/_astro/ari-newman.BaAj50ZH_ZyRjjk.webp)
Ari Newman
Co-Founder & Managing Director, Massive Capital Partners 
Dex provided an easy and effective way to make sure I stayed in touch with old friends and family [...] it's also been really easy to organize my networked job search using Dex's handy reminders and groups functionality. 
![Sid Singh](https://getdex.com/_astro/sid.Bw1W_wQ7_2kn0JU.webp)
Sid Sigh
MBA Candidate at Harvard Business School 
Dex is awesome, and is already making my life easier. Thanks for building a great product! 
![Kathryn McGarvey](https://getdex.com/_astro/kathryn.BMM2y7C7_Zh5Rlw.webp)
Kathryn McGarvey
Marketing Mentor & Coach 
I am blessed to meet so many amazing people through making films and writing books and cursed that I forget to keep them close. Dex solves this problem in a way that is elegant, intuitive and best of all fun. 
![Kevin Smokler](https://getdex.com/_astro/kevin-smokler.BeXzMNTM_Z1O8s2T.webp)
Kevin Smokler
Author and Documentary Filmkaer 
From networking with investors to exploring strategic partnerships, Dex makes organizing relationships simple. 
![Ryan Vet](https://getdex.com/_astro/ryan.KGoG9VjM_Z13KcXi.webp)
Ryan Vet
Startup Founder, Executive, Investor 
Dex is the first comprehensive personal CRM solution I've used that beautifully combines robust functionality with ease of use. 
![Troy Beebe](https://getdex.com/_astro/troy.D6Tm7iuA_Z2sbsBU.webp)
Troy Beebe
MBA Candidate at Kellogg

generated_description:
**Dex: The Personal CRM for Meaningful Connections**

**Overview**
Founded in 2019 and hailing from San Francisco, Dex is a personal CRM designed to help you manage your relationships more effectively. It emerged out of the founder's struggle with existing tools‚Äîlike Notion and Airtable‚Äîthat never quite fit the informal nature of personal connections. With a lean team of 7 and backing from Y Combinator (Batch S19), Dex challenges the conventional view of customer relationship management by focusing on personal relationships rather than sales pipelines.

**Mission**
Dex aims to be more than just a reminder tool. Its mission is to turn acquaintances into allies by encouraging users to maintain thoughtful follow-ups, whether it's that interesting person you met at a networking event or old school friends. By making relationship management simple and contextual, Dex helps you stay connected with the people who matter.

**Features**
- **Lightweight CRM:** Dex simplifies your life by blending seamlessly into your daily workflow. A Chrome extension allows you to manage relationships while using popular apps like Facebook and Twitter.
- **Actionable Reminders:** It sends you nudges to follow up and log interactions, ensuring you never miss an opportunity to reconnect.
- **Relationship Building:** With Dex, you can build stronger relationships by remembering critical details about how you met, important dates, and more.

**Usability**
Unlike heavyweight CRM systems like HubSpot that feel clunky for personal use, Dex is designed for busy individuals. It integrates directly with platforms like LinkedIn and Gmail, ensuring your contacts are always updated without tedious data entry. 

**Security & Privacy**
Dex takes user privacy seriously, supporting its service through subscriptions‚Äînot ads. You‚Äôre in control of your data, with the ability to export or delete it anytime.

**Target Audience**
Dex appeals to busy professionals, students (especially MBA candidates), investors, and creators looking to deepen their networks without getting bogged down by complex systems.

**Current Status**
With over 30,000 users, Dex is steadily growing as the go-to tool for those seeking to enhance their professional and personal relationships. If you're intrigued and want to give it a spin, you can start for free at [getdex.com](https://getdex.com).

In essence, Dex is redefining how we think about our networks‚Äîno longer merely lists of contacts but a living, breathing ecosystem of connections that can enhance both personal and professional lives.
